confirm-pass.title: Confirm Password
confirm-pass.desc: For your security, please confirm your password to continue.

delete-account.title: Delete Account
delete-account.info: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
delete-account.ask: Are you sure you want to delete your account? Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.

exceptions.Forbidden-Hint: Sorry, you are forbidden from accessing this page.
exceptions.Page-Not-Found-Hint: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found.
exceptions.Server-Error-Hint: Whoops, something went wrong on our servers.
exceptions.Service-Unavailable-Hint: Sorry, we are doing some maintenance. Please check back soon.

last-sessions.title: Browser Sessions
last-sessions.desc: Manage and log out your active sessions on other browsers and devices.
last-sessions.info: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Some of your recent sessions are listed below; however, this list may not be exhaustive. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
last-sessions.logout-info: Please enter your password to confirm you would like to log out of your other browser sessions across all of your devices.

profile-desc: Update your account's profile information and email address.

two-factor-auth.title: Two Factor Authentication
two-factor-auth.desc: Add additional security to your account using two factor authentication.
two-factor-auth.activated: You have enabled two factor authentication.
two-factor-auth.deactivated: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
two-factor-auth.info: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.

update-pass-desc: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.

verifications.resend-verification: Click here to re-send the verification email.
verifications.link-sent: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
